column4: Grrrrr I still got the same error " The HTTP server sent an invalid reply header"

google

just using "apt-get update"
that just means that one or more of the repos is not currently available ,  don'T worry about it , unless you messed with sources.list and changed a bunch of repos yourself
well  the problem is not on your end,   maybe the mirror is having problems,   give it a rest for today and try again tomorrow

this is the full error http://rafb.net/p/cNcBRZ69.html

and Im using dapper

ok
